title: Shroud of Turin Bargain of the Day: In Home & Kitchen, No Less
post: I am still waiting for a sale of the Miracle Tablecloth made of genuine plastic with the the Last Supper, embossed right on there,  that I heard about on the radio while driving to Fort Hood Texas in 1960.
author: John Klotz

title: Shroud of Turin Bargain of the Day: In Home & Kitchen, No Less
post:
Just wondering if you would willing to link Akiane’s ‘Prince of Peace” back to our site
http://www.JesusPrinceofPeace.com by Art & SoulWorks.  We are the exclusive licensor of Akiaen’s art which does not seem to be credited on you site – which I love by the way!
We would be happy to refer to you site as well.  Carol Corneliuson 303-670-0362
author: Carol
